itunes:title: Episode 751 - Topher and the Marine Rapper Get BANNED
title: Episode 751 - Topher and the Marine Rapper Get BANNED
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Marine Rapper and Topher to talk about their #1 hit song ‘The Patriot’, which has been banned from major platforms for being too conservative. The Marine Rapper and Topher also talk about Trump retweeting...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by The Marine Rapper and Topher to talk about their #1 hit song ‘The Patriot’, which has been banned from major platforms for being too conservative. The Marine Rapper and Topher also talk about Trump retweeting their song, how worried they are about the future of left-wing censorship, Joe Biden, and BLM.
